1.name: The Godfather
1.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

2.name: Deliverance
2.description: Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's dammed and turned into a lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a canoeing trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.

3.name: Ultimo tango a Parigi
3.description: A young Parisian woman meets a middle-aged American businessman who demands their clandestine relationship be based only on sex.

4.name: The Poseidon Adventure
4.description: Nine people explore a cruise ship at sea in a manner that turns their whole lives upside down.

5.name: Cabaret
5.description: A female girlie club entertainer in Weimar Republic era Berlin romances two men while the Nazi Party rises to power around them.

6.name: The Cowboys
6.description: Rancher Wil Andersen is forced to hire inexperienced boys as cowhands in order to get his herd to market on time but the rough drive is full of dangers and a gang of cattle rustlers is trailing them.

7.name: Solaris
7.description: A psychologist is sent to a station orbiting a distant planet in order to discover what has caused the crew to go insane.

8.name: The Last House on the Left
8.description: Two teenage girls head to a rock concert for one's birthday. While trying to score marijuana in the city, they are kidnapped and brutalized by a gang of psychotic convicts.

9.name: The Call of the Wild
9.description: A house dog is abducted and brought to the north as a sled dog.

10.name: Avanti!
10.description: A successful businessman goes to Italy to arrange for the return of his tycoon-father's body only to discover dad died with his mistress of long standing.

11.name: Slaughterhouse-Five
11.description: A man named Billy Pilgrim tells the story of how he became unstuck in time and was abducted by aliens.

12.name: Fritz the Cat
12.description: A hypocritical swinging college student cat raises hell in a satiric vision of various elements on the 1960s.

13.name: Jeremiah Johnson
13.description: A mountain man who wishes to live the life of a hermit becomes the unwilling object of a long vendetta by the Crow tribe, and proves to be a match for their warriors in single combat on the early frontier.

14.name: Pink Flamingos
14.description: Notorious Baltimore criminal and underground figure Divine goes up against a sleazy married couple who make a passionate attempt to humiliate her and seize her tabloid-given title as "The Filthiest Person Alive".

15.name: Frenzy
15.description: A serial murderer is strangling women with a necktie. The London police have a suspect, but he is the wrong man.

16.name: Viskningar och rop
16.description: When a woman dying of cancer in early twentieth-century Sweden is visited by her two sisters, long-repressed feelings between the siblings rise to the surface.

17.name: Sleuth
17.description: A man who loves games and theater invites his wife's lover to meet him, setting up a battle of wits with potentially deadly results.

18.name: Silent Running
18.description: In a future where all flora is extinct on Earth, an astronaut is given orders to destroy the last of Earth's botany, kept in a greenhouse aboard a spacecraft.

19.name: Aguirre, der Zorn Gottes
19.description: In the 16th century, the ruthless and insane Don Lope de Aguirre leads a Spanish expedition in search of El Dorado.

20.name: Meng long guo jiang
20.description: A man visits his relatives at their restaurant in Italy and has to help them defend against brutal gangsters harassing them.

21.name: Jing wu men
21.description: A young man seeks vengence for the death of his teacher.

22.name: The Getaway
22.description: A recently released ex-con and his loyal wife go on the run after a heist goes awry.

23.name: Sisters
23.description: A fledgling Staten Island journalist witnesses a brutal murder in the neighboring apartment of a French-Canadian model, but the police do not believe that the crime took place. With the help of a private detective, she seeks out the truth.

24.name: The Mechanic
24.description: An aging hitman befriends a young man who wants to be a professional killer. Eventually it becomes clear that someone has betrayed them.

25.name: What's Up, Doc?
25.description: The accidental mix-up of four identical plaid overnight bags leads to a series of increasingly wild and wacky situations.

26.name: Le charme discret de la bourgeoisie
26.description: A surreal, virtually plotless series of dreams centered around six middle-class people and their consistently interrupted attempts to have a meal together.

27.name: Boxcar Bertha
27.description: During the Great Depression, a union leader and a young woman become criminals to exact revenge on the management of a railroad.

28.name: Prime Cut
28.description: A vicious Kansas City slaughterhouse owner and his hick family are having a bloody "beef" with the Chicago crime syndicate over profits from their joint illegal operations. Top enforcer Nick Devlin is sent to straighten things out.

29.name: I racconti di Canterbury
29.description: Pasolini's artistic, sometimes violent, always vividly cinematic retelling of some of Chaucer's most erotic tales.

30.name: Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Sex * But Were Afraid to Ask
30.description: Seven stories are trying to answer the question: what is sex? Or maybe they are not trying.

31.name: Pánico en el Transiberiano
31.description: In 1906, in China, a British anthropologist discovers a frozen prehistoric creature and must transport it to Europe by train.

32.name: Roma
32.description: A fluid, unconnected and sometimes chaotic procession of scenes detailing the various people and events of life in Italy's capital, most of it based on director Federico Fellini's life.

33.name: Sweet Sugar
33.description: Prostitute Sugar is set up by a corrupt politician. She is convinced of the futility of appealing her case in the courts and signs on to a chain gang run by the notorious Dr. John who ...                See full summary »

34.description: A musical retelling of the American Revolution's political struggle in the Continental Congress to declare independence.

35.name: The Big Bird Cage
35.description: Grier and Haig are thieving mercenaries who engineer a prison break from the outside.

36.name: Joe Kidd
36.description: An ex-bounty hunter reluctantly helps a wealthy landowner and his henchmen track down a Mexican revolutionary leader.

37.name: The Heartbreak Kid
37.description: A newlywed man on his honeymoon has second thoughts about his marriage and falls for a different woman.

38.name: The Candidate
38.description: Bill McKay is a candidate for the U.S. Senate from California. He has no hope of winning, so he is willing to tweak the establishment.

39.name: Un flic
39.description: After a shaky first heist, a group of thieves plan an even more elaborate- and more risky- second heist.

40.name: Non si sevizia un paperino
40.description: A reporter and a promiscuous young woman try to solve a series of child killings in a remote southern Italian town rife with superstition and a distrust of outsiders.

41.name: Chato's Land
41.description: In 1870s New Mexico, a half-breed kills a bigoted sheriff in self-defense but the posse that eventually hunts him finds itself in dangerous territory.

42.name: L'amour l'après-midi
42.description: Though he has an adoring wife, a bourgeois man is still tempted to pursue other women.

43.name: Super Fly
43.description: The daily routine of cocaine dealer Priest who wants to score one more super deal and retire.

44.name: Tales from the Crypt
44.description: Five strangers get lost in a crypt and, after meeting the mysterious Crypt Keeper (Sir Ralph Richardson), receive visions of how they will die.

45.name: Kozure Ôkami: Ko wo kashi ude kashi tsukamatsuru
45.description: The story of a Ronin (i.e. a masterless samurai) who wanders the countryside of Japan with his small child, having various adventures.

46.name: Blacula
46.description: An ancient African prince, turned into a vampire by Dracula himself, finds himself in modern Los Angeles.

47.name: Schulmädchen-Report 4. Teil - Was Eltern oft verzweifeln lässt
47.description: A fake documentary about the sex lives of teenage girls.

48.name: The Life and Times of Judge Roy Bean
48.description: In Vinegaroon, Texas, former outlaw Roy Bean appoints himself the judge for the region and dispenses his brand of justice as he sees fit.

49.name: Brother Sun, Sister Moon
49.description: This is a dramatization of events in the life of St. Francis of Assisi from before his conversion experience through his audience with the pope, including his friendship with St. Clare.

50.name: Conquest of the Planet of the Apes
50.description: In a futuristic world that has embraced ape slavery, Caesar, the son of the late simians Cornelius and Zira, surfaces after almost twenty years of hiding out from the authorities, and prepares for a slave revolt against humanity.
